channel.title: Other Runescape 2 Beta photos
channel.description:
We are limited right now to amount of photos taken during the RS2 beta period, I found a video that had more. I didn't know where to post this, but I doubt anyone really played during this period.
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=0K3DitBwxbA

item.title: Other Runescape 2 Beta photos
item.dc:creator: @mod_taharok Taharok
item.description:
@mod_taharok wrote:

I would upload my beta client for nostalgia’s sake, but it’s either 2,000 miles away or lost forever. That and, it never worked well anyway. Was really cool experiencing the beta though. Not as real as these photos, but still neat.

Read full topic

item.title: Other Runescape 2 Beta photos
item.dc:creator: @RSPS_Mirrors RSPS Mirrors
item.description:
@RSPS_Mirrors wrote:

If you look at the chat box, all messages are not formatted. No capitalization, no punctuation. I reckon this suggests that Jagex have some sort of automated text formatting system that makes it easier to write out dialogue and other types of Strings.

Maybe the RSPS community should create such a system.

Read full topic

item.title: Other Runescape 2 Beta photos
item.dc:creator: @Ruby_Forums_Coder Ruby
item.description:
@Ruby_Forums_Coder wrote:

I can vaguely remember playing the Beta after a friend first told me about RuneScape. I do remember the delay Silab is talking about. I think I may have a few screenshots on an old laptop in my attic, if I can get it to charge I’ll definitely try and post some.

Read full topic

item.title: Other Runescape 2 Beta photos
item.dc:creator: @the_elve_age the elve age
item.description:
@the_elve_age wrote:

[quote=“Miss Silabsoft, post:7, topic:465411”]So of the pictures from the video must be from a private server, I played the beta and remember it didn’t announce which spell was being cast when clicking.[/quote]I doubt they are private servers or faked, the snapshots were used by an older snapshot tool which fit around the period and not to mention I’ve never seen someone host the RS2 Beta or even have the cache of it.

Read full topic

item.title: Other Runescape 2 Beta photos
item.dc:creator: @silabsoft RuneAgent
item.description:
@silabsoft wrote:

So of the pictures from the video must be from a private server, I played the beta and remember it didn’t announce which spell was being cast when clicking. Some of the biggest issues with the beta had been emote attacking which involved using dance and attacking a npc or player it would delay about two or three hits causing you to do ‘massive’ damage on the first visual strike.

Another issue was the party chest it did not accurately remove the items in your inventory so if you had a party hat you can use put X option and set it to “99999999” and it would only remove 1 from your inventory. This caused massive duping of objects during the beta which may have been intentional as everyone started pking with dragon squares and such.

Read full topic

item.title: Other Runescape 2 Beta photos
item.dc:creator: @Rodgerwilco Rodgerwilco
item.description:
@Rodgerwilco wrote:

Eh I played it… my account I kept in rsc but my cousin moved onto rs2. We both played his account. I remember the transition from 2d sprites to actual models for npcs and my eyes hated it (since I played rsc since feb 2001). If I recall, a lot of people moved onto play it (or created new accounts so they could keep their rsc)

I could only imagine all the bugs we would find if Jagex reopened it.

Read full topic
